r.s: Class to perform HTTP requests. Uses an adapter based system for performing those requests
r.d:
Please see the examples dir for basic usage
Adapters are available for based on the following code and are used in this order:
* PEAR2\HTTP\Request\Adapter\Http (uses the Pecl Http class) * PEAR2\HTTP\Request\Adapter\Curl (based on the curl extension, not complete) * PEAR2\HTTP\Request\Adapter\Phpstream (based on the http php stream code) * PEAR2\HTTP\Request\Adapter\Phpsocket (based on php sockets, built from PEAR1 HTTP_Request)
Additional adapters:
* PEAR2\HTTP\Request\Adapter\Filesystem (useful for mock Internet interaction)
